So, how do I make it work? How do I use the crack!?

hur får man det att funka?? 
jag har insallerat det med cd1.... 
sedan när jag tryker på exe filen där jag installerat det så händer inget??

First off all, you don't have to download more than cd1... and to make the game work, you'll have to install the 1.70 patch located on cd1... then copy the crack from cd1 over the .exe in your DK2 directory.

That's how I got it to work.
